title: Improving Few-Shot Prompts with Relevant Static Analysis Products
description: Adding explicit semantic facts as prompts to Large Language Models improves their performance in code summarization tasks, with notable improvements exceeding 2 BLEU and, in some cases, even surpassing 30 BLEU, demonstrating the effectiveness of this approach in enhancing code analysis and extraction of essential information.
